info.title: AI21 Studio API
info.description: Access our powerful language models using an API that makes you smile

tags.name: custom-models
tags.description: AI21 Studio lets you easily customize our language models to deliver optimal results for your specific use-case. Custom models are trained on your data, representing your unique needs, and then instantly deployed and kept accessible on-demand. You can have as many custom models as you need to support a variety of different contexts or users.

tags.name: datasets
tags.description: To train a custom model, you will need to collect a dataset of training examples. Each example consists of a prompt, which is a valid input text, and a completion, which is a correct output for that specific prompt.

tags.name: completion
tags.description: You can generate a text completion for a given text prompt by posting an HTTP request to the complete endpoint corresponding to the desired language model to use. The request contains the input text, called a prompt and various parameters controlling the generation.

tags.name: tokenize
tags.description: You can tokenize any input prompt: that is, send your prompt in a string, and receive back a list of tokens that comprise this string

tags.name: rewrite
tags.description: Paraphrase any sentence up to 500 characters

tags.name: slice
tags.description: Split long texts into slices in a smart way
